name: UK Hard House
description: Defined by offbeat bass patterns, compressed 909-style drums, buildup-drop structures, hoover sounds, and tempos between 120 and 155 BPM.

children.name: Scouse House
children.description: Features an upbeat and energetic sound often described as being "bouncy", influenced somewhat by Happy Hardcore.

children.name: Speed House
children.description: Mixes busy, dirty sound design and intense drums derived from Bass House with fast tempos from 140-160 BPM, pumping basslines, and other UK Hard House influences.
